anyone can me help with installing one t: open System > Preferences > Appearence, and go to the tab named "Themes"

then you can either drag 'n' drop the .tar.gz theme file to this window, or click the "Install" button and search for it manually. You can also put the folder contained in the theme directly inside the .themes/ folder in your home
Can you help me with installing icons ? :)
you can drag 'n' drop the same way, or put the icon folders to .icons :)
